Test Case 1: The host should be 10.49.247.88

Bytecode:

14
40 0 0 12
21 0 4 2048
32 0 0 26
21 8 0 171046744
32 0 0 30
21 6 7 171046744
21 1 0 2054
21 0 5 32821
32 0 0 28
21 2 0 171046744
32 0 0 38
21 0 1 171046744
6 0 0 262144
6 0 0 0

Test Case 2: The protocol should be TCP:

Bytecode:

12
40 0 0 12
21 0 5 34525
48 0 0 20
21 6 0 6
21 0 6 44
48 0 0 54
21 3 4 6
21 0 3 2048
48 0 0 23
21 0 1 6
6 0 0 262144
6 0 0 0

Test Case 3: If IP packet, then TTL is < 2

Bytecode:

6
40 0 0 12
21 0 3 2048
48 0 0 22
53 0 1 2
6 0 0 0
6 0 0 262144


Test Case 4: If protocol is TCP, then length is <= 64

Bytecode:

24
40 0 0 12
21 0 5 34525
48 0 0 20
21 6 0 6
21 0 18 44
48 0 0 54
21 3 16 6
21 0 15 2048
48 0 0 23
21 0 13 6
128 0 0 0
37 0 11 64
40 0 0 12
21 0 5 34525
48 0 0 20
21 6 0 6
21 0 6 44
48 0 0 54
21 3 4 6
21 0 3 2048
48 0 0 23
21 0 1 6
6 0 0 0
6 0 0 262144
